snippet: A proposal by North Korea calls for an end to all the cross-border invective both sides have hurled at each other for decades.
abstract: Proposal by North Korea calls for an end to cross-border invective with South Korea that both sides have hurled at each other for decades; proposal is tied to another request for United States and South Korea to halt joint military exercises, which the White House and South Korean officials reject.
lead_paragraph: A proposal by North Korea calls for an end to all the cross-border invective both sides have hurled at each other for decades.

headline.main: Let’s Cease the Insults, North Korea Says to South
headline.print_headline: Let’s Cease the Insults, North Korea Says to South
